[Global Namespace]::​CItemRegistry
class CItemRegistry {...}

Item registry.

Functions
GetIdForName
int GetIdForName(
const string& in szName
) const

Gets the id associated with the given weapon name. Returns WEAPON_NONE if no id is associated with the given name.

RegisterItem
int RegisterItem(
const string& in szName,
const string& in szSpriteDir,
const string& in szPrimaryAmmoName = "",
const string& in szSecondaryAmmoName = "",
const string& in szPrimaryAmmoClass = "",
const string& in szSecondaryAmmoClass = ""
)

Registers the given entity name as an item and returns the id associated with it.

Returns WEAPON_NONE if no id could be assigned to it.

const string& in szSecondaryAmmoClass = ""
)

Registers the given entity name as a weapon and returns the id associated with it.

Returns WEAPON_NONE if no id could be assigned to it.
